mapper.insert: insert into bike_board(user_id,product_name, title,image, price,info,status,regdate) values (#{userid}, #{productname}, #{title}, #{image}, #{price}, #{info}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: select b.*, u.nickname as nickname from bike_board b join user u on b.user_id = u.user_id order by b.bike_id desc
mapper.update: update bike_board set product_name = #{productname}, title=#{title}, image=#{image},price= #{price}, info=#{info} where bike_id = #{bikeid}
